GMS - Google Mobile Services, a necessary component for the normal operation of applications. All notifications, logging into games, Google Play and other device functions use this component
Why do I need GMS for this app?
GMS is necessary for notifications to work, for music to work, and for many other application components
It is an open alternative to GMS services with the ability to install it on a non-GMS device
What to do after installing MicroG?

1. Log in to your Google account in the MicroG settings
2. Enable device registration
3. Enable cloud messaging
4. Reinstall VTLite
5. Allow him to receive notifications

An error has occurred in VTLite!

Due to the fact that you are using a third-party firmware from the list below, notifications may come with a delay or not at all. 
Click on the "Disable optimization" button to fix this problem. 

Third-party firmware on which problems with push are observed:
Flyme, EMUI, MIUI, ColorOS, Samsung Experience or TouchWiz, Magic UI, ZenUI, Funtouch OS
There is no Google Play Services (GMS) component on your device, which is necessary for VTosters Lite to work correctly

The VTosters Lite modification has nothing with VK Group!\nDistributed completely free of fee!\nBy clicking continue, you agree with the collection of basic information about the device and that the developers of this modification are not responsible for your account

The application may not work correctly due to the fact that you are most likely using the shell from the list below. All problems with the display and work of the application are related only to your firmware and only with it. All bug reports sent due to problems on this firmware are not considered by the developers and will not be fixed.

Pressing the "Continue" button, you agree that possible application bugs may occur due to the specifics of your firmware. We recommend using AOSP-based firmware for maximum stability.

Flyme, EMUI, MIUI, ColorOS, Samsung Experience or TouchWiz, Magic UI, ZenUI, Funtouch OS
